message.content:
cs.DC, cs.Distributed, cs.PL, cs.AR, cs.PF 

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper discusses the integration of CUDA processing within a general purpose C++ runtime system for parallel and distributed applications. 
- cs.Distributed is also likely as the paper focuses on utilizing all available resources, including local or remote acceleration cards on a cluster. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages) is a possible category as the paper discusses the integration of CUDA code into the overall programming model of HPX. 
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is a possible category as the paper discusses the challenges of utilizing different acceleration cards on high performance systems and future architectures like exascale clusters. 
- cs.PF (Performance) is a possible category as the paper discusses the goal of utilizing all available resources to achieve high performance capabilities.
